trans-unit.source: Specifies the impersonation behavior for a service operation on a service instance.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 인스턴스에서 서비스 작업에 대 한 가장 동작을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImpersonationOption enumeration to control impersonation in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: 가장을 제어 하려면 ImpersonationOption 열거형을 사용 하 여 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 응용 프로그램입니다.

trans-unit.source: This setting interacts with a configuration property on <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A> in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 이 설정은에서 구성 속성과 상호 작용 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>다음 표에.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Impersonation is performed if credentials are available and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 자격 증명을 사용할 수 있는 경우 가장이 수행 하 고 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>같으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a validation exception occurs at service startup time.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>같으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, 서비스 시작 시간에 유효성 검사 예외가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>
